title: Maruti, Hyundai, Toyota gear up for launch of seven-seater models amid growing demand
description: Korea’s Kia too is likely to roll out a seven-seater EV based on its popular UV model, Carens next year, people said. Others include upgraded versions of MG Motor’s Gloster, Jeep’s Meridian and Kia’s Carnival models at the more premium end of the market.
